== Adlatus Network Linux Group ==

Adlatus Network is a support company in Bad Saulgau, Germany. 
----
Staff of this company are Linux fans. 
So, this group was created to provide help and support on installing and configuring linux systems for normal people :) Ubuntu is the best solution :) Free support for free linux :)

So, how to contact us:
